DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective describe safety efficacy intravenous sodium fluorescein visualize ureteral efflux intraoperative cystoscopy total laparoscopic hysterectomy . Secondary objective report surgeon 's satisfaction overall use sodium fluorescein .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sodium Fluorescein Use During Intraoperative Cystoscopy After Total Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty patient ( n=30 ) ongoing total laparoscopic hysterectomy tertiary gynecological reference center include prospective descriptive study.Once hysterectomy complete , 10 % solution sodium fluorescein 0,25 ml dose inject perform diagnostic cystoscopy . Time injection fluorescent visualization record well coloration density . Adverse event collect operating room , recovery room , patient 's discharge home survey .
DOC.criteria: total laparoscopic hysterectomy breastfeed renal insufficiency Medication : Probenecid , digoxin , quinidine hypersensitivity intolerance sodium fluorescein
